github: "github update" command can allow you to download last update scripts from GitHub repository.
version: The "version" command displays the current version of the database. This command has no additional parameters.
versions: The "versions" command displays all versions of the database. This command has no additional parameters.
help:
The "help" command is used to display the manual for each command.
 - help version
 - help update
